title: Unable to Connect to chat
body:
I have been unable to connect to Chat Within the legacy and new client, Which prevents me from talking to my teammates or seeing my friends online until i'm within game. I shall attach a few Photos to Confirm this.

https://images.discordapp.net/eyJ1cmwiOiJodHRwczovL2Rpc2NvcmQuc3RvcmFnZS5nb29nbGVhcGlzLmNvbS9hdHRhY2htZW50cy8yODgzNDcyMjQxOTczMDAyMjQvMjkzNTIwNTIxNzEzMjg3MTY4L1JpdG8yLlBORyJ9.rJXoNluHnB2IgOeDorTegWV_I3U?width=609&height=379

replies.body: I have attempted Restarting my Computer, Redownloading League, Changing time and dates, The Current Fix you have offered. But Itseems my Chat is still unable to work, It troubles me as I am not able to communicate outside of a League match.

Chat disconnection issues can sometimes be a little tricky to get to the bottom of, but it seems like your network is having a difficult time connecting to our chat servers specifically. Let's first try going through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to be sure that your network has a stable connection overall.

Hit me back up if that doesn't seem to help!
